# Definition of Done
### As a team, before declaring an item in the Sprint Backlog as 'Done,' we ensure it meets the following criteria:
- [ ] Code completion meets developers' standards.
- [ ] The code has been refactored.
- [ ] All acceptance criteria have been met.
- [ ] Code checked into the repository.
- [ ] Unit tests are written and passed.
- [ ] 100% test coverage.
- [ ] Peer programming and review.
- [ ] Code merge and tagging.
- [ ] Successful integration tests.
- [ ] Resolution of bugs, improvements, and changes.
- [ ] Performance testing.
- [ ] Review and acceptance by the Product Owner.
- [ ] Final approval in the Sprint Review or demo.
